mapper.select: SELECT * from (dmtroom room inner join user on room.DMTRoomID = user.roomID) inner join inoutrecord on user.username = inoutrecord.username WHERE room.DMTID = #{dormitoryID} and user.role = '学生';
SELECT * from (dmtroom room inner join user on room.DMTRoomID = user.roomID) inner join inoutrecord on user.username = inoutrecord.username WHERE user.username = #{userID};
select DMTID from (dmtroom inner join dormitory d on dmtroom.DMTID = d.dormitoryID) inner join user on dmtroom.DMTRoomID = user.roomID where user.username = #{userID};
